=== What do I do in Ubuntu? ===

Initially I was using ubuntu for professional reasons, migrating a large number of workstations (+/- 5000) to Ubuntu. After a time working with ubuntu, discovered that it could be part of something more, and decided to contribute to the project. I hope you are doing good work, and if not, I hope improving..
